author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes the latest devlopments to the Phase-2 L1 correlator. The local PR is https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1031

We would like this PR to be backported to 12_5 for our Phase-2 MC production

#### PR validation:

code-checks, code-format, objects validated in our local branch
title: [L1T] Phase-2, correlator developments
